THE UNIVERSITY DF TENNESSEE
DIVISION OF UNIVERSITY EXTENSION
BOX 8450, UNIVERSITY STATION
KNOXVILLE
RADIO AND TELEVISION SERVICES
RADID STATIDN WUQT
October 6, 1954
Mr. Frank Schooley
Station WILL
The University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Frank:
I am afraid tte t I will not be aULe to be in New York on
Tuesday due to a heavy teaching load on Monday and Tuesday.
I will be at the convention, however, arrivirg We dne sday morning.
I will look you up to see if I can contribute anything and to
fiid out what has gone on, I’m very sorry I can’t make the
committee meeting, but four days away at this time of tte year
is all I can manage.
I’ll see you in New York on the 27th.
Regards
Director of Broadcasting
